result.eng: Ireland was a poor country a long time ago.
result.ga: Ba thír bhocht í Éire fadó
result.orig: Ba thír bhocht í Éire fadó
result.html: Ba thír bhocht í Éire fadóIreland was a poor country a long time ago.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṫír ḃoċt í Éire fadóIreland was a poor country a long time ago.

result.eng: He always remained loyal to his country.
result.ga: D'fhan sé i gcónaí dílis dá thír
result.orig: D'fhan sé i gcónaí dílis dá thír
result.html: D'fhan sé i gcónaí dílis dá thírHe always remained loyal to his country.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan sé i gcónaí dílis dá ṫírHe always remained loyal to his country.

result.eng: Both countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
result.ga: Tá trúpaí Mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn
result.orig: Tá trúpaí Mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn
result.html: Tá trúpaí Mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonnBoth countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
result.ponchtml: Tá trúpaí Ṁeiriceá sa dá ṫír sin fós deiċ mbliana anonnBoth countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
